129  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1, SeqViewDouble& v2) {
130 
131  Dmatrix *arg1 = v1.GetData();
132  Dmatrix *arg2 = v2.GetData();
133 
134  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
135  Resize(v1.GetSize());
136  LogWarning("BisquareWindow: Resizing window");
137  }
138 
139  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
140  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
141  LogWarning("BisquareWindow: Resizing output");
142  }
143 
144  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
145 
146  v2.SetScale(v1.GetScale());
147  v2.SetStart(v1.GetStart());
148  v2.SetSampling(v1.GetSampling());
149 
150 
151  };
152 
158  void Resize(unsigned int size) {
159  BaseWindow::Resize(size);
160  FillWindow();
161  }

189 
196  void FillWindow() {
197  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow.size(); i++) {
198  double x = 0.5 * mWindow.size() - 0.5;
199  double q = fabs(i - x) / x;
200  mWindow(i) = (1.0 - q * q)*(1.0 - q * q);
201  }
202  Normalize();
203  };
204 
205 
206  };
